scripts.start:dev: concurrently -n server,client "npm --prefix server run start:dev" "npm --prefix client run start"
scripts.build: npm --prefix server run build && npm --prefix client run build
scripts.test: npm --prefix server run test && npm --prefix client run test
scripts.format: npm --prefix server run format && npm --prefix client run format
scripts.lint: npm --prefix server run lint && npm --prefix client run lint
scripts.postinstall: npm --prefix server ci && npm --prefix client ci
scripts.precommit: npm --prefix server run precommit && npm --prefix client run precommit
